verses.verse: Brethren<WG80>, if<WG1437> <WG2532> a man<WG444> be overtaken<WG4301> in<WG1722> a<WG5100> fault<WG3900>, ye<WG5210> which<WG3588> are spiritual<WG4152>, restore<WG2675> such an one<WG5108> in<WG1722> the spirit<WG4151> of meekness<WG4236>; considering<WG4648> thyself<WG4572>, lest<WG3361> thou<WG4771> also<WG2532> be tempted<WG3985>. if: or, although
Bear ye<WG941> one another's<WG240> burdens<WG922>, and<WG2532> so<WG3779> fulfil<WG378> the law<WG3551> of Christ<WG5547>.
For<WG1063> if a man<WG1536> think himself<WG1380> to be<WG1511> something<WG5100>, when he is<WG5607> nothing<WG3367>, he deceiveth<WG5422> himself<WG1438>.

But<WG1161> let<WG1381> every man<WG1538> prove<WG1381> his own<WG1438> work<WG2041>, and<WG2532> then<WG5119> shall he have<WG2192> rejoicing<WG2745> in<WG1519> himself<WG1438> alone<WG3441>, and<WG2532> not<WG3756> in<WG1519> another<WG2087>.
For<WG1063> every man<WG1538> shall bear<WG941> his own<WG2398> burden<WG5413>.
Let<WG1161> him that is taught<WG2727> in the word<WG3056> communicate<WG2841> unto him that teacheth<WG2727> in<WG1722> all<WG3956> good things<WG18>.

Be<WG4105> not<WG3361> deceived<WG4105>; God<WG2316> is<WG3456> not<WG3756> mocked<WG3456>: for<WG1063> whatsoever<WG3739> <WG1437> a man<WG444> soweth<WG4687>, that<WG5124> shall he<WG2325> also<WG2532> reap<WG2325>.

For<WG3754> he that soweth<WG4687> to<WG1519> his<WG1438> flesh<WG4561> shall<WG2325> of<WG1537> the flesh<WG4561> reap<WG2325> corruption<WG5356>; but<WG1161> he that soweth<WG4687> to<WG1519> the Spirit<WG4151> shall<WG2325> of<WG1537> the Spirit<WG4151> reap<WG2325> life<WG2222> everlasting<WG166>.
And<WG1161> let us<WG1573> not<WG3361> be weary<WG1573> in well<WG2570> doing<WG4160>: for<WG1063> in due<WG2398> season<WG2540> we shall reap<WG2325>, if we faint<WG1590> not<WG3361>.

As<WG5613> we have<WG2192> therefore<WG686> <WG3767> opportunity<WG2540>, let us do<WG2038> good<WG18> unto<WG4314> all<WG3956> men, especially<WG1161> <WG3122> unto<WG4314> them who are of the household<WG3609> of faith<WG4102>.
Ye see<WG1492> how large<WG4080> a letter<WG1121> I have written<WG1125> unto you<WG5213> with mine own<WG1699> hand<WG5495>.

As many as<WG3745> desire<WG2309> to make a fair shew<WG2146> in<WG1722> the flesh<WG4561>, they<WG3778> constrain<WG315> you<WG5209> to be circumcised<WG4059>; only<WG3440> lest<WG3363> they should suffer persecution<WG1377> for the cross<WG4716> of Christ<WG5547>.

For<WG1063> neither<WG3761> they themselves<WG846> who are circumcised<WG4059> keep<WG5442> the law<WG3551>; but<WG235> desire<WG2309> to have<WG4059> you<WG5209> circumcised<WG4059>, that<WG2443> they may glory<WG2744> in<WG1722> your<WG5212> flesh<WG4561>.

But<WG1161> God forbid<WG3361> <WG1096> that I<WG1698> should glory<WG2744>, save<WG1508> in<WG1722> the cross<WG4716> of our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>, by<WG1223> whom<WG3739> the world<WG2889> is crucified<WG4717> unto me<WG1698>, and I<WG2504> unto the world<WG2889>. by whom: or, whereby

For<WG1063> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> neither<WG3777> circumcision<WG4061> availeth<WG2480> any thing<WG5100>, nor<WG3777> uncircumcision<WG203>, but<WG235> a new<WG2537> creature<WG2937>.

And<WG2532> as many as<WG3745> walk<WG4748> according to<WG2583> this<WG5129> rule<WG2583>, peace<WG1515> be on<WG1909> them<WG846>, and<WG2532> mercy<WG1656>, and<WG2532> upon<WG1909> the Israel<WG2474> of God<WG2316>.

From henceforth<WG3064> let<WG3930> no man<WG3367> trouble<WG3930> me<WG2873> <WG3427>: for<WG1063> I<WG1473> bear<WG941> in<WG1722> my<WG3450> body<WG4983> the marks<WG4742> of the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424>.

Brethren<WG80>, the grace<WG5485> of our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> be with<WG3326> your<WG5216> spirit<WG4151>. Amen<WG281>. To<WG4314> the Galatians<WG1052> written<WG1125> from<WG575> Rome<WG4516>.
